name: Space Attack (Filking)
description:
Space Attack

This is a Shoot ’em up game in the space.

 You control a cool looking Spaceship that must attack the coming Asteroids for Energy.

 You have 3 Lives and an Energy-Bar.

 If your Energy-Bar reaches Zero you will be slowing down and after 20 Seconds without Energy you lose the control of the Spaceship for 3 Seconds.

 The Game also gets faster and harder over time.

 Try getting the best Highscore of all and good luck. 


This is my first released game and I would like to hear what you think about the game.
